review: Good streamer for it's value.  I have an ATV 3 as well and love the remote so when I heard about the TV Stick I went for it.  I now have it on my extra TV and  love that it has a remote.  Way better than chromecast that needs an app on your mobile device to function and was always getting stuck on my ipad and never really worked well on my macbook.  It can be a little slow though.  I guess that's why they have the more expensive one that's supposed to be faster but it gets the job done.  I rated it 4 stars because the user interface could use a little work.  Other than that it's pretty darn cool.
author: sfalba
